text:
Although the incident was resolved,
the scars of the damage still remained
at the ceremony hall of Archimedes Colony.

Rapid restoration work was being carried out,
primarily by the heroes themselves,
and the solemn atmosphere was gradually being restored.

Having finished the day's work and disbanded,
[Player] was called over by a certain person.

name: Orbiter
text: [Player], good work!

options.text: Good work to you too, Orbiter!
Thank you for helping out today too.

name: Orbiter
text:
I'm aiming to be a hero too!
Helping out is only natural!

name: Orbiter
text:
[Player], you're also done
with work for today, right?

name: Orbiter
text:
Hey, hey, let's chat a little!
I told Andrew and Flamier that I'd be home late!

options.text: Of course, let's sit down for a bit.
I wanted to talk to you too, Orbiter.

text:
Orbiter nodded to [Player]
and sat down next to them.

name: Orbiter
text:
Today, during lunch break,
Captain told me a lot of stories.

name: Orbiter
text:
Like the astronaut training,
the kind of work he did,
and also how to live in space!

name: Orbiter
text:
Also, Crowne is teaching me
how to assemble a spaceship too!

name: Orbiter
text:
I'll train every day,
and once "Orbiter No. 2" is complete,
I'll go on another big adventure in space!

Orbiter spoke cheerfully,
dangling his legs.

options.text: You have so many things you want to do!

name: Orbiter
text:
Yeah, thank you, [Player].
I'm going to properly aim to be an astronaut this time!

name: Orbiter
text:
...In the last adventure, I realized that
I still have a lot of things I'm lacking.

name: Orbiter
text:
Back then, I didn't understand anything,
so I was desperate to escape from the moon, but...

name: Orbiter
text:
Now, I understand myself
and everyone a little better.

name: Orbiter
text:
To the people I've caused trouble for,
I hope I'll be able to tell them that
I'm just trying my best, someday.

Orbiter clasped his hands in front
of his chest and pulled himself together.

options.text: It's amazing that you can think that way.

name: Orbiter
text:
Ehehe...! Thank you, [Player]!
Being praised makes me really happy!

name: Orbiter
text:
But, the reason I could think
that way is thanks to you, [Player].

name: Orbiter
text:
After all, you gave me the
opportunity to remember my own memories, [Player]!

Orbiter held [Player]'s hand and
flashed a happy look on his face.

And then, he gently brought
that hand to his own chest.

name: Orbiter
text:
—Hey, [Player].
When you were inside me...
what did it feel like?

options.text: It made me feel warm inside.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Really?
If that's true...
then I'm happy too.

name: Orbiter
text:
I was a little anxious.
Because I did put you inside me
without your permission, [Player].

name: Orbiter
text:
...I wondered if you'd think
that it was unpleasant or creepy.

Orbiter looked down slightly,
then gazed at [Player] to gauge their reaction.

name: Orbiter
text:
...But, I absolutely wanted
to save you, [Player].

name: Orbiter
text:
I thought that if I didn't help you,
I'd regret it forever.

name: Orbiter
text:
...I've failed to save someone once before—
that's what it felt like.

Orbiter looked into the distance
with a lonely expression.

name: Orbiter
text:
When that footage was saved,
I should've been present, yet—

name: Orbiter
text:
Even so,
if I had been able to fly freely in space,
would I have been able to save that person...?

Hearing [Player]'s words,
Orbiter looked up in surprise.

name: Orbiter
text:
[Player], I'm sorry.
Thank you for encouraging me.

name: Orbiter
text:
...But, it's alright.
I want to know about that person.
Because they entrusted their dream to me.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Besides, I'm not alone anymore.
[Player], I have you and everyone by my side!

name: Orbiter
text:
So, I definitely want to find a clue.
No matter where it is in space!

Saying that, Orbiter gazed
directly at [Player].

name: Orbiter
text:
...Hey, [Player].
If "Orbiter No. 2" is completed—

name: Orbiter
text:
[Player], will you go on
an adventure with me?
Orbiter asked [Player] hesitantly.

name: Orbiter
text:
I want to go to space, but...
I know that you might not want to, [Player].

name: Orbiter
text:
Even so...
I wonder if you'd come to space with me.

[Player] gently caressed Orbiter's back,
as he held his shoulders up in nervousness.

options.text: I'm looking forward to the adventure.

name: Orbiter
text: —Yeah! Yay—!!

name: Orbiter
text:
I'd be so happy if
I could be with you, [Player]!!

name: Orbiter
text:
Next time, let's make a big spaceship!
We need to make sure there are two seats,
and lots of space for luggage!

name: Orbiter
text:
Let's go on adventures to all the stars together!
It's a promise, [Player]!
Orbiter, excited, embraced [Player].

name: Orbiter
text:
Alright, I have to study even harder
to become an astronaut!

name: Orbiter
text:
...Ah, but before that!
[Player], would you go out together with me tomorrow?

name: Orbiter
text:
The festival stalls that were set up
for the ceremony are gradually reopening!

name: Orbiter
text:
I've always wanted to go—!
Tomorrow's your day off, right?
[Player], you'll come along, right?

name: Orbiter
text:
Let's take a walk together!
I'll buy souvenirs for Captain, Andrew and the others!

Orbiter held [Player]'s hand and continued talking cheerfully.
[Player] gently squeezed his hand back.

—From the window of the ceremony hall,
the blue Earth glowed gently.

The two's cheerful voices,
would echo for eternity for all to hear.
